summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 HONDA CR-V. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTIFICATION FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 19V383000 (STEERING, AIR BAGS, COMMUNICATIONS). THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER DID NOT HAVE THE REMEDY OR AN IDEA WHEN THE REMEDY WOULD BE AVAILABLE TO REPAIR THE VEHICLE. KEYES HONDA (5905 SEPULVEDA BLVD, VAN NUYS, CA 91411) CONFIRMED THAT THE PART AVAILABILITY WAS UNKNOWN. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
